title.narrative: To alleviate the suffering of patients waiting on the waiting list for surgical operations in the Ministry of Health and alleviate the burden of the MoH through conducting surgical operations with high quality in Al Awda Hospital in the northern Gaza Strip - OPT

description.narrative:
The idea of the project responds to a dire humanitarian need related to the complex humanitarian situation in the Gaza Strip. The idea is to provide surgical services to patients in need of surgical intervention to save their lives, alleviate their pain and reduce the complications of diseases.
During the project implementation, surgical operations will be conducted to the registered patients on the Ministry of Health (MoH) long waiting lists. Due to the inability of the MoH hospitals to carry out the elective surgical operations due to the state of emergency associated with the Great Return of March, and the allocation of MoH hospitals to conduct only emergency operations and postponement of all elective operations until the end of the event of emergency. This has led to the accumulation of the number of patients who need to undergo operations for long periods of more than 18 months, which might cause increasing the suffering of patients and threatening their lives in addition to increasing the complications of diseases. Moreover, the electricity cuts for very long hours reaching 20 hours a day, has contributed to the stopping of elective operations, in the light of the lack of availability of fuel needed to run generators to operate health facilities, led to partially close about 23 government health facilities and 3 hospitals.
This is in addition to the severe shortage of essential drugs and medical disposables in the MoH, and the disruption of many medical devices and equipment in MoH facilities.
Hence, the idea of the project focuses on conducting 805 surgical operations for needy and vulnerable patients (male and female) according to priorities of the Ministry of Health in the northern area of Gaza Strip, these surgical operation will be conducted at Al Awda Hospital. This service will include all pre-operation tests as well as surgical procedures and hospitalization, including treatment, meals and special postoperative and follow-up examinations. All services from admission to discharge from the hospital will be totally free of charge.
